data.text:
@cjocfm -Spending time with my family, with no devices 😊
- coffee on the deck
- no housework (and not just left  for me to do later 😜)
- time to read

@cjocfm Chuckling because I suspect the 'mothers' out there are likely too busy to see or respond to this post (typed by a single woman, not fortunate enough to be anyone's 'mother' except for some incredibly sweet pet dogs). Best guess is mothers would like peace, time alone & vacation
